pages.text: You should never mine $(item)Spawners$(), they can still be very useful for e.g. mob traps or simply farming. $(br2)You should try deactivating them with light instead. $(br)Just put a $(item)Torch$() or something like that on the $(item)Spawner$(). $(br2)Only $(thing)Blaze$() & $(thing)Silverfish$() $(item)Spawners$() need a lot more light in the area to disable it.
